betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The §6Pressurized Reaction Chamber§r (§7or PRC§r) is a machine mostly §eused to create §6Substrate§r, §6HDPE Pellets§r, and §6Ethylene§r.

To craft the PRC, you will need two §6Steel Ingot§rs, two §6Basic Control Circuit§rs, two §6Basic Gas Tank§rs, a §6Dynamic Tank§r, an §6Enriched Alloy§r, and a §6Metallurgic Infuser§r.

The PRC accepts §eliquids on the back, gases from the left, and outputs gas on the right§r by default but this can be changed in the §eIO config§r.
